src/lib/components/ColorScales/ColorScal.description:
ColorScales is a Dash wrapper for `react-colorscales`.
It takes an array of colors, `colorscale`, and
displays a UI for modifying it or choosing a new scale.

id.description: The ID used to identify this compnent in Dash callbacks

colorscale.description: Optional: Initial colorscale to display. Default is Viridis.

nSwatches.description: Optional: Initial number of colors in scale to display.

fixSwatches.description: Optional: Set to `True` to fix the number of colors in the scale.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called whenever any of the
properties change

src/lib/components/Select/Select.jsx.description: Select is a dash wrapper for the html select tag.

id.description: The ID used to identify this compnent in Dash callbacks

value.name: union
value.description:
The value of the dropdown. This value
corresponds to the items specified in the
`value` property.

options.description:
An array of options {label: [string|number], value: [string|number]},
an optional disabled field can be used for each option

value.description:
The value of the input. If `multi` is false
then value is just a string that corresponds to the values
provided in the `options` property. If `multi` is true, then
multiple values can be selected at once, and `value` is an
array of items with values corresponding to those in the
`options` prop.

multi.description: If true, the user can select multiple values

className.description: Appends a class to the select tag

style.description: Appends styles to the select tag

parent_className.description: Appends a class to the wrapping div

parent_style.description: Appends inline styles to the wrapping div

setProps.description: Dash-assigned callback that gets fired when the input changes

persistence.description:
Used to allow user interactions in this component to be persisted when
the component - or the page - is refreshed. If `persisted` is truthy and
hasn't changed from its previous value, a `value` that the user has
changed while using the app will keep that change, as long as
the new `value` also matches what was given originally.
Used in conjunction with `persistence_type`.

persisted_props.description:
Properties whose user interactions will persist after refreshing the
component or the page. Since only `value` is allowed this prop can
normally be ignored.

persistence_type.description:
Where persisted user changes will be stored:
memory: only kept in memory, reset on page refresh.
local: window.localStorage, data is kept after the browser quit.
session: window.sessionStorage, data is cleared once the browser quit.

src/lib/components/WebvizPluginPlacehold.description:
WebvizPluginPlaceholder is a fundamental webviz dash component.
It takes a property, `label`, and displays it.
It renders an input with the property `value` which is editable by the user.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks

buttons.description:
Array of strings, representing which buttons to render. Full set is
['download', 'contact_person', 'guided_tour', 'screenshot', 'expand']

contact_person.description:
A dictionary of information regarding contact person for the data content.
Valid keys are 'name', 'email' and 'phone'.

download.description:
A dictionary with information regarding the resource file the plugin requested.
Dictionary keys are 'filename', 'content' and 'mime_type'.
The 'content' value should be a base64 encoded ASCII string.

screenshot_filename.description: File name used when saving a screenshot of the plugin.

tour_steps.description: Tour steps. List of dictionaries, each with two keys ('selector' and 'content').

data_requested.description:
An integer that represents the number of times
that the data download button has been clicked.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called whenever any of the
properties change
